name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manual Test Case Genius of BotGenius+ Family

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to input text through a popup and submit it to ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ManualTestCase Geniusis a Chrome extension that enables the automated generation of structured manual test cases for software products. The extension adds an interactive button to the page, which upon click prompts the user for their product specifications or system requirements. The AI-powered Senior Software QA Engineer from the BotGenius+ family uses this input to create comprehensive manual test cases. The generated test cases encompass sections like 'Test Case ID', 'Test Case Description', 'Pre Steps', 'Test Steps', 'Pre Condition', 'Test Data', 'Expected Results', 'Actual Results', 'User Acceptance Criteria', and 'Comments'. This tool enhances testing efficiency and reduces the manual labor involved in test case creation.
